Row.Text: Bad Omen
Seers have interpreted the {1_Omen} to be a sign of the Gods' disfavour with us.
birth of an ugly child
twisted insides of a pigeon
destruction of a sacred tree
ailment of a wise old hag
infliction of gout upon us
We must make a sacrifice in order to restore favour.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50% you will gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_FOOD] Growth in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]90% you will gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]70% you will gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]30% you will gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
We have made a sacrifice to the Gods! But it does not seem that they were listening...
We have made a sacrifice to the Gods! It seems to have pleased them for now.
Good Omen
Seers have interpreted the {1_Omen} to be a sign of the Gods' favour with us.
recovery of a sickly maiden
rising of the sun
delicious insides of a rabbit
recovery of our slight cough
recovery of our gout
It's about time!
I am humbled by the Gods' favour.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
A Good Omen upon us speaks to the favour of the Gods!
The Heathen Guard

A member of the court of {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has approached us to enlist one of our personal guards to the service of their prestigious Heathen Guard; an army composed strictly of pagan soldiers. They offer us great pay, but to the sacrifice of one of our most loyal guards.
Very well.
No. My guards are not objects to be lent.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital's garrison[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital's garrison gains a bonus promotion[ENDCOLOR]
We have agreed to send one of our guards to the service of a foreign court, in exchange for a generous pay - destined for us, of course.
We have refused the offer of a foreign court to enlist one of our guards into their service.
Call for State Religion
There are now many followers of {1_Religion} within our empire and our elite have called for us to formally declare this as the State Religion of our nation.
It is agreed. We shall adopt this State Religion.
We shall do no such thing.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Religion} becomes your State Religion[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
Apocalyptic Threat

A number of the clergy have raised concerns that a recent plague conspires in the favour of a foretold apocalypse. They believe that something must be done to show faith, and appeal to you for action.
Indeed the apocalypse comes! Let the disbelievers suffer!
Donate money to them! Charity shall appease the Lord.
Superstitious nonsense.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]33% of all religious minorities and non-believers in the empire are converted to your State Religion[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety and {3_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
In fear of an impending apocalypse, heretics throughout the empire have converted to our State Religion.
In fear of an impending apocalypse, we have donated gold to the clergy.
We have dismissed claims of an impending apocalypse.
Mass conversions are occuring in the {1_CivName} as a result of claims of an impending apocalypse.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has donated large sums of gold to the clery under threat of an impending apocalypse.
Radical Philosopher

A Philosopher has posed serious questions against our faith. These questions are beginning to cause unease amongst the faithful and if we cannot resolve them promptly, they may turn people against us.[NEWLINE]
Perhaps this is a sign that our religion is misguided.
Embrace these questions! Pursuit of their answers can only strengthen our faith.
Execute the Philosopher! Their heresy cannot be tolerated.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance that 20% of your empire will convert away from your State Religion[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety and {3_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
We have lost faith in the infallibility our religion. Oh well.

We have embraced the questions of a radical philosopher in the hopes that their answers shall strengthen our religion. Unfortunately, however, we've thus far come to realize that the philosopher is quite mad.
We have embraced the questions of a radical philosopher in the hopes that their answers shall strengthen our religion. So far, this has been to great success!
We have executed a radical philosopher who had dared to question our religion.

We have executed a radical philosopher who had dared to question our religion. Unfortunately, this seems to only have worsened the influence of his beliefs and a portion of our empire has converted away from our religion.
The radical teachings of a {1_CivAdj} philosopher has cast doubt in the mind of {2_LeaderName} of {3_CivName} in regards their faith.
The radical teachings of a {1_CivAdj} philosopher have been embraced by {2_LeaderName} of {3_CivName}.
A {1_CivAdj} philosopher has been executed in the {2_CivName} for questioning religious doctrine.
Religious Corruption

A few vocal members of the clergy have begun denouncing their superiors as being corrupt. They claim that our religious elite conduct simony and usury. Some have even gone so far as to question our own piety. We must appease these clergy somehow, before the public start to believe in their accusations.[NEWLINE]
Investigate these claims! We shall cleanse the clergy of corruption.
Have the agitators thrown in prison.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
We have begun to investigate claims against corruption amongst the religious elite. Indeed it was true! Several Priests had been engaging in lewd conduct, and they have been dealt with accordingly.

We have begun to investigate claims against corruption amongst the religious elite. Unfortunately, our investigation has turned up nothing. The agitators likely had some personal vendetta against their superiors.
We have thrown in prison those who have accused the religious elite of corruption. We have been graciously compensated by those elite as a result.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has vowed to cleanse the {3_CivAdj} clergy of their corruption.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has denounced claims of corruption amongst the {3_CivAdj} clergy.
Court Heretic

The clergy have decried one of the members of our court as being a heretic, who allegedly cohorts with {1_Demons} and practices witchcraft! We do not know if these accusations have any merit, but they are beginning to disquiet the court. Something must be done on the matter.[NEWLINE]
These claims are unfounded, and I shall not sacrifice a good courtier for them.
The courtier will be exiled, but we shall pay for them to live in comfort.
Have the heretic burned alive!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain 1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {3_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
We have dismissed claims of heresy against a member of our court. In a show of appreciation, they have pledged to double their efforts in their service to our court.
We have exiled a courtier accused of heresy for their own sake, but they shall live their days in comfort for their long-standing service to our court.
We have put to death a courtier accused of heresy! God take his soul.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has denied claims of heresy within their court.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has banished from their court a courtier accused of heresy.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has put to death one of the members of their court for heresy.
Pagan Uprising

A violent group of followers of our long-discarded pagan Gods, long having worshipped in secret, have sparked an uprising within our empire. Driven mad by their barbarous devotion to heresy, they are beyond reconciliation, and can only be stopped by means of force.[NEWLINE]
We must put this uprising down!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Two barbarians spawn within your empire[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
A pagan uprising has begun within our empire. But God shall deliver us to victory!
A pagan uprising has broken out in the {1_CivName}.
Witchcraft

Rampant acts of witchcraft have been reported throughout the empire. Witchcraft is of the highest blasphemy and it is unacceptable that this practice has become so wide-spread. We must act swiftly and without mercy against the abominations that have orchestrated this heresy![NEWLINE]
But I love witchcraft...
Establish an inquisition to root out witchcraft wherever it might dwell!
Let us encourage vigilantism against the witches.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a random [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_GOLD] Gold or [ICON_RESEARCH] Science boost[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The Grand Inquisition is constructed in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
We have shamelessly declared our tolerance for witchcraft. Somehow, as if by magic, we receive {1_Num} {2_Type}!
We have established the Holy {1_Adjective} Office of the Universal Inquisition Against Witchcraft and Wizardry to root out witchery in our empire.
We have promoted local vigilantism against witchcraft. Peasants are gleefully hunting down witches wherever they find them - unfortunately, we suspect some innocents have been killed in the process.
We have promoted local vigilantism against witchcraft. Nobles are joyously hunting down witches for sport.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has purportedly embraced witchcraft.
{1_LeaderName} has launched an inquisition to root out witchcraft in the {2_CivName}.
Religious Diaspora
Followers of {1_Religion} cast from their homeland have come to our borders seeking refuge. They bring with them foreign ideas, but also an abundance of gold - perfect to line our pockets.[NEWLINE]
They are welcome in my empire! Should they pay the price, of course.
Turn them away! I shall accept no heretics in my empire.
We shall give them our mercy, unconditionally.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]10% of all [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in each city will convert to {2_Religion}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {3_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]10% of all [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in each city will convert to {2_Religion}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {3_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have embraced religious minorities - and their coin - seeking refuge in our empire.
We have turned away religious minorities seeking refuge in our empire.
We have embraced religious minorities seeking refuge in our empire.
Followers of {1_Religion} seeking refuge have been accepted by {2_LeaderName} into the {3_CivName}.
Followers of {1_Religion} seeking refuge have been turned away by {2_LeaderName} of {3_CivName}.
Voice of God

Word that a lowly soldier speaks with God has reached our Court. The soldier claims that God has ordained them to lead our armies to great success. Whether this be true or not, it is causing some unease amongst our high officers, and should be addressed promptly.[NEWLINE]
This soldier is clearly speaking blasphemy and must be brought to justice.
Perhaps we should heed the word of this soldier.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Great General which begins with the Medic promotion[ENDCOLOR]
We have executed a soldier that had been speaking blasphemy. We pray we have made the right decision.
We have heeded the word of a soldier claiming to hear the voice of God. We pray that good will come of this.
A soldier claiming to speak to God in the {1_CivName} has been put to death.
A soldier claiming to speak to God has been embraced by {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}.
Temple Destroyed!
A freak accident in the city of {1_CityName} has led to the destruction of the local Temple. The priests there claim that is a sign that God disfavours our current level of piety.[NEWLINE]
We shall pledge gold to rebuild this Temple at once.
We shall not pay for a new one.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The Temple in {1_CityName} is destroyed[ENDCOLOR]
The Temple at {1_CityName} has been re-constructed and spared the disfavour of God.
The Temple at {1_CityName} shall remain in ruins.
Miracle

Clergy in the city of {1_CityName} claim that a miracle has been witnessed at the local {2_Building}. Their claims have begun to attract pilgrims, who allege that a child has been born to a previously infertile noblewoman.[NEWLINE]
Embrace these miracles! They are proof of our divine.
People should be paying to see something so precious!
Have the perpetrators rescind their claims or thrown in jail for this blasphemy.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
We have embraced a miracle within our empire!
We have enforced an admission price over a miracle within our empire.
We have put a stop to all claims of a miracle within our empire.
{1_LeadeName} has embraced claims of miracles being performed within a city in the {2_CivName}.
{1_LeadeName} has denounced claims of miracles being performed within a city in the {2_CivName}.
Relic Peddler

A renown purveyor of ancient and sacred relics has approached us with an offer of what he claims to be a genuine {1_RelicName}. If the sanctity that the peddler purports is true, then as a good and faithful ruler we must possess this most sacred relic.[NEWLINE]
We must purchase these relics, whatever the cost.
A purveyor of false worship and in-genuine sale, more like.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]80% chance to gain a free Artifact[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
We have purchased a new religious relic: a genuine {1_RelicName}.
Unfortunately, the {1_RelicName} that we purchased would seem to have been a fake and is completely worthless.
We turned away a peddler of religious relics claiming to be in possession of a genuine {1_RelicName}.
Homosexual Priest

It has come to our attention that a member of the clergy has taken to the company of a handsome young man, in a way most inappropriate. We have been asked to respond to the matter discretely.[NEWLINE]
Perhaps we should pay this Priest a visit.
This is outrageous. The Priest must be defrocked immediately.
If the Priest has done no harm, then it is no concern of ours.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
We have paid a visit to a reportedly homosexual member of the clergy.
We have defrocked a reportedly homosexual member of the clergy.
We have allowed a reportedly member of the clergy to continue their romantic interests at their discretion.
Benedictine Monk

The many holy centres within our empire often attract pilgrims, bringing with them wealth and faith abound, but they still refuse to permanently settle. A Benedictine Monk has recently arrived at our court. If we persuade him to stay, it would surely benefit the faith of our realm. We should be weary, however, that such an act would interfere with the Monk's sacred pilgrimage and could be considered blasphemy.[NEWLINE]
Let us persuade the Monk to settle within our realm.
We should not interfere in the Monk's pilgrimage.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Monastery in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
We have persuaded a Benedictine Monk to settle in our empire and establish a new Monastery.
Pagan Festival

A once commonplace pagan festival is fast approaching and the people are concerned that their new religion would prohibit their participation in the celebrations. If we let the festival go ahead, it might appease our people, but at what cost to our piety?[NEWLINE]
Let the festival proceed.
This blasphemy will not happen under my watch.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 2 turns

[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_BULLET]30% chance that the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital will enter 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
We have allowed a traditionally pagan festival to proceed, in spite of this obvious blasphemy.
We have forbidden the procession of a traditionally pagan festival, to the benefit of our piety.
We have forbidden the procession of a traditionally pagan festival. However, our decision has been met with some resistance in the capital.
{1_LeaderName} has forbidden a traditionally-held pagan festival to proceed in the {2_CivName}.
{1_LeaderName} has allowed a traditionally-held pagan festival to proceed in the {2_CivName}.
Holy Order

A band of warriors calling themselves the {1_Flavour} in Service of {2_ReligionName} have arrived at our Court, asking that they be allowed to establish a Chapter of their order within our empire. In doing so, they pledge their name in the defence of the religious integrity of our state. If we turn them down, they may never be seen again, so we must think carefully on this matter.[NEWLINE]
It is agreed. Their order shall find home within our empire's borders.
We shall not have these merchants of war in our homeland. We trust in God.
Alas, we cannot afford to patronise their order, and must turn them away.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chapter Houses are established in all cities following your State Religion. Chapter Houses increase the starting XP for Land Units and increase a city's [ICON_PEACE] Faith output[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have embraced The {1_Flavour} and their Chapters have been established throughout our empire.
We have turned away The {1_Flavour} in favour of our faith in God.
We have been forced to turn away The {1_Flavour} in Service of {2_ReligionName}, for that we lack the faith to patronise them.
The {1_Flavour} in Service of {2_ReligionName} have established their Chapter Houses in {3_CivName}.
The {1_Flavour} in Service of {2_ReligionName} have been turned away by {3_LeaderName} of {4_CivName}.
Chapter House
+15 XP for all Land Units.

Can only be acquired through the Holy Order event. Chapter Houses provide experience for military land units constructed in the city. This experience can be used to give the units Promotions, making them more effective in battle.

A Chapter House is the local meeting place for religious military orders; societies founded for the purpose of defending and propagating a particular faith - usually Christian. Many famous military orders were active during the Middle Ages, such as the Teutonic Knights, the Knights Hospitaller, and the Knights of Saint John. Today, those military orders survive, exist strictly a charitable or ceremonial organisations, and no longer partake in the persecution of the blasphemous.
Clergy Concerned

A number of the clergy have raised concerns over the extent of heresy in the empire; it is so widespread that more than half the empire follows a foreign religion! They appeal to us to address the matter.[NEWLINE]
The people can worship how they wish. But our State Religion is ancient and sacred.
Perhaps it is time to change our State Religion.
We shall create a special mission to remedy this heresy.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Your State Religion becomes {2_NewStateReligion}[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50% of your empire is converted to your State Religion[ENDCOLOR]
We have decreed that our State Religion is to remain, despite the mass of heresy committed against it.
We have decreed that our State Religion is to become {1_NewStateReligion} in accordance with the beliefs of our people.
We have established a mission to counter the widespread heresy being committed within the empire.
Clergy Concerned

A number of the clergy have raised concerns over our level of piety. They accuse us of having become complacent in our faith, and that it has slipped dangerously into heresy. Their concerns must be settled.[NEWLINE]
If the sovereign does it, it is not heresy.
It is true. But I shall do my utmost to repent my impiety.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE} Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
We have condemned accusations of heresy against us, much to the disapproval of the clergy.
We have accepted accusations of heresy against us, and have pledged to repent for our impiety.
Call for Secularization
The people no longer approve of the idea that their nation would promote one religion over another; believing it illiberal and oppressive. They call for the secularization of the state.[NEWLINE]
Absolutely not. Our State Religion is the irrefutable law of God.
If the people will it, then so be it.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital goes into one turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital goes into one turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your State Religion is disbanded[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have rejected the call of the people to secularize the state.
We have conceded to the demands of the people and have pledged to initiate the secularization of the state.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has denied calls for the {3_CivAdj} state to be made secular.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has conceded to demands for the {3_CivAdj} state to be made secular.
Fog From Hell

A mysterious and deadly fog has suddenly appeared over a forest near the city of {1_CityName}. It is said by the local folk that the fog is a conjuration of the evil beyond and that those that enter it are never seen again. Whatever it may be, it infects the land with its noxious fumes and we must act to dispel it.[NEWLINE]
A show of faith will surely have it dissipate.
Have our best researchers figure it's cause.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]30% chance that the Fallout is cleared[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]30% chance that the Fallout is cleared[ENDCOLOR]
After a night of intense devotion, the hellish fog surrounding one of our cities has finally dissipated.
After a night of intense devotion, the hellish fog surrounding one of our cities unfortunately yet remains.
Researchers have determined that the hellish fog surrounding one of our cities is but a natural phenomenon, and predict that it shall soon pass.
Researchers have been unable to determine the cause of the hellish fog surrounding one of our cities.
Hagia Sophia
The great Hagia Sophia is a monument to an improper faith. We must take great care to see that the wonder is converted for our religious needs.[NEWLINE]
We wish to preserve it's Monastery.
We wish to convert it into a {1_BuildingDesc}.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The free Monastery from the Hagia Sophia is removed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free {2_BuildingDesc} in {3_CityName}[ENDCOLOR]
To no-one's notice, we have decreed the Monastery at the Hagia Sophia remain untouched.
At great personal expense but greater devotion, we have ordained the conversion of the Hagia Sophia into a religious monument worthy of our faith.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has converted the Hagia Sophia into a {3_BuildingDesc}.
Book Burning
Local priests have decried a new novel as inciting witchcraft and wizardry, and have organized a book burning in order to see the book and its contents destroyed.[NEWLINE]
We endorse these burnings.
We must put a stop to this!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have approved the gathering of a book burning against a novel said to incite witchcraft, much to the dismay of writers across the nation.
We have forbidden the book burning of a novel said to incite witchcraft, dampening the clergy's opinion of us.
Rosicrucian Manifestos

Documents of unknown authorship have surfaced in {1_CityName} claiming the existence of an esoteric order which follow an unusual blend of modern faiths and ancient rites. According to the documents, the order - known as the Order of the Rose Cross - aim to create a cultural and religious movement to one day unite and reform the religions of the world. Perhaps if we were to allow the Hermetic faith to be freely practiced within our realm, this order would make themselves known.[NEWLINE]
Then we must open our minds to Hermeticism.
Mere fantasy.
These documents are dangerous and must be destroyed.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT][ICON_RELIGION_JFD_HERMETICISM] Hermeticism is founded in {2_CityName}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
We have opened our cities to the teachings of Hermeticism, in the hopes that the Order of the Rose Cross might make themselves known.
We have declared the Order of the Rose Cross as nothing more than myth and legend.
We have decreed the destruction of any documents pertaining to the Order of the Rose Cross.

Following the surfacing of documents purporting the existence of an esoteric order known as the Order of the Rose Cross, {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has opened their cities to the teachings of Hermeticism, in the hopes that the Order might reveal themselves to the world.
Documents purporting the existence of an esoteric order known as the Order of the Rose Cross have emerged in {2_CivName}.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has ordered the destruction of documents purporting the existence of an esoteric order known as the Order of the Rose Cross.
Religious Schism

A malcontent theologian has decried the moral failings of our faith. His work has had a serious impact upon the people of {1_CityStateName}, and they have begun to take up the cause of a new religion: {2_ReligionDesc}.[NEWLINE]
This blasphemy shall not stand!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_ReligionDesc} is founded in {1_CityStateName}[ENDCOLOR]
A malcontent theologian has decried the moral failings of {1_ReligionDesc}. His teachings have inspired the emergence of a new faith, {2_ReligionDesc}, in the city of {3_CityStateName}.
A malcontent theologian has decried the moral failings of {1_ReligionDesc}. His teachings have inspired the emergence of a new faith, {3_ReligionDesc}, in the {2_CivAdj} city of {4_CityStateName}.
Bodhisattva

A wandering stranger from an exotic land has arrived at our court, bringing with him the esoteric teachings of his master. They call him a Bodhisattva - one who has postponed nirvana for the benefit of others. He requests only that we might grant him lodgings for the night.[NEWLINE]
He shall teach us the Dharma.
He may stay, but I shall hear no word from him.
Throw him out. This is not an inn.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Followers of {1_Religion} in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital convert to {2_Religion}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]If not already, you meet the founder of {2_Religion}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]30% chance that the Fallout is cleared[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]
Our faith has become enraptured by the teachings of a wandering Boddhisattva, and we have become convinced that Buddhism is the path to enlightenment.
We have agreed to allow a wandering Boddhisattva to take lodging at our Palace, so long as they would refrain from preaching their so-called Dharma.
We have forbidden a wandering Boddhisattva from lodging at our Palace; much to the pleasure of the clergy.
A wandering Boddhisattva, an adherent of the Buddhist faith, has enraptured the faith of {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Reward} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose all your [ICON_FAITH] Faith[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose all your [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points and stop a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age if started[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Great Prophet[ENDCOLOR]
